alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 11:24AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BAY...EASTERN WALTON...WESTERN HOLMES AND WESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM EDT/1115 AM CDT/... At 1124 AM EDT/1024 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of De Funiak Springs to 12 miles south of Panama City Beach. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Panama City Beach, De Funiak Springs, Union, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, St Andrews State Park, Seminole Hills, Cerrogordo, Gulf Resort Beach, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach, and Millers Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
